name: BookMyForex.com
overview:
BookMyForex offers online money exchange and foreign remittance (money transfer) services in India

BookMyForex is the first e-commerce platform of its kind that is designed to make the process of buying and selling foreign exchange simple and convenient in India. We offer a full suite of forex services and our product offering consists of currency notes, prepaid travel cards, traveler’s cheques, foreign currency demand drafts and foreign currency wire transfers. Whether you need to buy forex for travel or send money abroad to pay for foreign education or foreign investments, we’ve got you covered. Need to exchange foreign currency into Indian rupees here in India? We’ve got you covered there as well. No matter what your need is, our interactive portal will guide you through your forex transaction, step by step, ensuring a pleasant user experience and guaranteeing compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

Through an exclusive tie up with our banking partner, Axis Bank, BookMyForex has the ability to offer its customers extremely competitive rates consistently. Furthermore, our tie-up with Axis Bank gives us enormous reach, making our distribution network of over 1700 locations the largest in India. So you, the customer, never has to travel far to take care of your forex needs. We go a step further and offer you door delivery from select locations of Axis Bank and BookMyForex.

With BookMyForex you can book a transaction 24x7. You even have the option to book your transaction at the exact rates shown on the site, which are derived from live and real-time market rates that are accurate to the last second. Alternatively you can choose to pay nothing on the site when you do a transaction. BookMyForex is all about customer experience and our objective is to bring efficiency in delivering forex and personal remittance products to your door-step while offering the most competitive rates. BookMyForex will offer one standard rate for each currency / product no matter which part of the country you may be in.
